content: round 144 sts 156 sts change to cc keep on knitting 3 rounds in mc and 2 rounds in cc round 4 knit one round round 5 k36 m1 k39 m1 repeat to end of round 148 sts 160 sts keep on working stockinette stitch for another 36 41 rounds knit 74 80 sts place marker m1r place marker knit 74 80 sts place marker m1r slip start-of-row marker 150 162 sts start working the crotch knit one round work to marker slip marker m1r knit to marker m1l slip marker to end of round repeat these two rounds until you have 17 19 sts between markers knit one round putting the 17 19 sts between markers plus the the stitch before and after on a holder 19 21 sts each you should have 72 78 sts left for each leg when you cut your working yarn remind to leave an about 50cm long tail for closing the crotch later jagheteralice min kärlek babypants puenktchen on ravelry 3 this pattern is for free - feel free to knit this as often as you like don t copy or sell legs size 0-3 months knit 3 rounds k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of round k2tog k1 repeat three times 64 sts left size 3-6 months knit 11 rounds k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of round k2tog k1 repeat two times 72 sts left knit in st st for another 22 25 rounds decrease rounds 0-3 months k6 ssk 8 times 52 sts k1 k2 ssk 6 times k1 reapeat once 40 sts 3-6 months k4 ssk 12 times 60 sts k3 ssk 12 times 48 sts change to needlesize 2 5 and continue with k2p2-ribbing work ribbing for 25 32 rounds bind off loosely finishing close crotch by using kitchener stitch sew in ends co 4 sts for i-cord work 70 90 cm bind off pull i-cord through waistband- eyelets jagheteralice min kärlek babypants puenktchen on ravelry 4 this pattern is for free - feel free to knit this as often as you like don t copy or sell
